dmca.title: [ABUSE] trademark infringement and slander from webnewsforus.com
dmca.body:
T

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
Policy Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2006 7:02 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] trademark infringement and slander from
webnewsforus.com]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] trademark infringement and slander from webnewsforus.com
Date: Thu, 13 Apr 2006 04:01:09 -0400
From: Rusty Crawford <rusty@uscity.net>
To: <abuse@domainsbyproxy.com>
CC: WEBNEWSFORUS.COM@domainsbyproxy.com, abuse@theplanet.com

Dear Sir or Madam:

It has come to our attention that one of your hosting customers is blatantly
infringing our trademark using your facilities and equipment.  Particularly,
your customer -- webnewsforyou.com -- has infringed our trademark property
rights, and continues to infringe, our word mark "uscity.net" on it's
website hosted on your servers. This company has also engage in morally
objectionable activities, to slander our company name, which is also a
violation or your service agreement.

An example of the display can be seen at the following link:

http://webnewsforus.com/blog/category/cheats/
http://webnewsforus.com/blog/uscitynet/17
http://webnewsforus.com/blog/category/cheats/scripts/

The display of our tademark belonging to USCity.net by webnewsforus.com is
being done without the permission of USCity.net and is in violation of
USCity.net's trademark protections.  I'm sure that your terms of service,
prohibit the use of it's facilities and equipment for infringing the
trademark of others.

USCity.net demands that it's trademark protected mark be removed from
display on your servers immediately.  If this material is not removed within
10 days of this email, we will pursue more formal means to resolve this
issue.

Sincerely yours,

Rusty Crawford, CTO

USCity.net
P.O. Box 1646
New Smyrna Beach, FL  32170
(386) 427- 1171


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFEPj3KvK/XpJs6oyURAocdAJ421vEnLf3X1Wyvt7PoZVqjteR/SACgiCMz
v9hKl/8Di601Ol2Mr9XB4lY=
=6Zyy
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
